title: Even if the amenity space is reduced to make the project viable a minimum of at least 8% of amenity open space shall be maintained at ground level
clause_text: Even if the amenity space is reduced to make the project viable a minimum of at least 8% of amenity open space shall be maintained at ground level.
section: Relaxation in Building and Other Requirements

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
